conference.title: Early Bird Ticket Sale for PHPConf.Asia 2016

div.p: PHPConf.Asia 2016 is happening in Singapore on 22-24 August 2016. Tutorial Day on 22 Aug. 2 day single track conference on 23 and 24 August.
Keynote Speakers: Davey Shafik (@dshafik) and Samantha Qui√±ones (@ieatkillerbees)
Early Bird Tickets available now! (valid till 5 August). Visit https://2016.phpconf.asia for more details.
